title: Post 3000

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have the abilities and attributes of Post 3, Post 30, Post 300, and Post 3000.
- You don't suffer any consequences for killing Town members.

desc:
Post 2999
*Guys, look! We hit 3000 roles! What do you mean, we did that two hours ago and post 3000 was taken three months ago?*
Variable/Invincible
